Kool!

But you have to remember...Sai = Okinawan Weaponry...not ninja!


ninja Weapons...to name a few...
1.  Shuko and Ashiko
2. Sinbo
3.  Kusari gama
4.  shaken and shuriken...

though they were used almost by anyone, I believe the ninja made 
these few very famous...

Well, the ichimonji no kamae is a "traditional" ninja 
posture...guess what...what is the weapon they hold in hands??

Anyone have an opinion?


Later...
